Name: Fragrant Lilac
SeedDescription: Plant in summer. Takes 7 days to produce a faint, cute flower.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en verano. Toma 7 días para producir una flor tenue y linda.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 여름에 심으세요. 7일 후 향기롭고 귀여운 꽃이 핍니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Sommer. Wächst in 7 Tagen zu einer hellen, hübschen Blume heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plantez en été. Prend 7 jours pour produire une fleur.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket nyáron ültesd el. 7 nap alatt hoz egy illatos, aranyos virágot.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 夏植えの花。7日かけてはかなげな花を咲かせる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no verão. Demoram 7 dias para produzir uma flor fraca, contudo fofa.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Через 7 дней вырастает тусклый и милый цветок.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天播种。7天后产出柔软的，可爱的花。
